mods.abstract: The papers relate to the operation of the store and plantation at Chatsworth, and to the Gardere and Staring families. The bulk of the material consists of store ledgers, which record accounts and laborers' payrolls. There is also material from a plantation journal in French and English, possibly written in part by Fergus Gardere. Miscellaneous material includes legal and business papers of Joseph Staring and letters to Fergus Gardere.
